resources.string:
If you have to make a decision 
 but can't decide? 

 Just spin the wheel 
 and let nature decide it for you based on the principle of Quantum Superposition!
Something went wrong - Nature is not in a mood to select. Please try again later.
If you have to make a decision but can\'t decide?\n\nJust spin the wheel and let nature decide it for you based on the principle of Quantum Superposition!
based on the principle of Quantum Superposition! You could also try the app #quantumwheel -
